org.codehaus.mojo.rmic

Class RmiCompilerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.mojo.rmic.RmiCompilerConfiguration

  • public class RmiCompilerConfiguration
extends Object
    Based on CompilerConfiguration, but since that class has too much javac-specific properties, create an custom version.
    Since:
    1.3
    Author:
    Robert Scholte
